localize.text: Risk Level {0} : {1}
Congrats for completing the Risk {0} Level Challenge of {1}
and more Keypages
Gain {1} Keypage: “{0}”

Are you sure about disabling Contract Reward Pages? Disabling Contract Reward Pages will remove all of available Reward Pages, and will no longer provide Reward Pages aftter completing high risk level receptions. This setting is more suitable for players that only want to enjoy diffcult playthroughs using this mod.

Are you sure about enabling Contract Reward Pages? Enabling Contract Reward Pages will reward you powerful Equip Page after future completion of High Risk Level Reception. Previously accquired Reward Pages will also be given after re-enabling Contract Rewards.
Preview
Counter Form
First Page
Second Page
None
Speed Furioso
When attacking, if target has Suffocating Haze, deal +{0} damage. When hit, if the attacker has Suffocating Haze, take {1} less damage.
Nameless Shell

Take {0} Damage and Stagger Damage at the End of the Scene and Subtract 1 stack If the character has both Corrosions and the difference between their stacks is less than {1}, they will take no Damage and Stagger Damage from them
<color=#FFA226>Yesterday Promise</color>
Conductor: At the end of each Scene, set Emotion Level to the highest Emotion Level among all Reverberation Ensemble members.
Cello: When using Page with Slash dice, boost all dice of that page maximum value by +2.
Harp: After successful hit with Blunt die, recover 2 Stagger Resist.
Percussion: The third Blunt Die gain +1 Power.
Horn: Pierce dice gain +2 Damage.
Tuba: Pierce dice gain +2 Break Damage.
Trombone: Pierce dice gain +1 Power.
Clarinet: After successful hit with Pierce die, next die gain +1 Power.
Viola: After rolling a Slash die, the next Slash die gain +2 minimun value.
Second Violin: Slash dice gain +2 Break Damage
First Violin: Slash dice gain +2 Damage
Pipe Organ: In a Clash with Blunt die, reduce incoming damage by 2.
